title: Received a Reward
body: I had just received a reward from RITO and I can't seem to find anything new.. Can someone tell me what it was? Date: 5/11/17 Time - Central Time Zone - 3:55 PM {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Hey NotATot,

Looks like the reward was this icon below for getting 33 kills across Dark Star : Singularity games. Congratz on that achievement!

https://puu.sh/vNa4k/630cebec5b.jpg
